Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Ohio
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand & Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand, then resume their normal route on Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Southbound #44 Wallace/Racine  Reroute near 74th/Racine
ShortDescription: Southbound 44 Wallace/Racine  buses are temporarily rerouted near 74th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 74th, Loomis, 76th, Racine, and resume normal route, due to near 74th/Racine.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
